name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno (Chapter 3)
description: Symploké: Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 3 ONLY if you got through Chapter 2.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Direct Draw or Direct X compatible card Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Mouse
